title: High and low-tech ways to tackle India's water crisis
description: India's water situation requires a big investment in tech and many small projects on the ground.

title: NHS IT supplier held to ransom by hackers
description: Its IT provider says it may take three or four weeks to fully recover from the cyber-attack.

title: Disney adds subscribers but warns over cricket loss
description: The media giant is gaining subscribers as it details plans to launch an ad-supported service in December.

title: Meta's chatbot says the company 'exploits people'
description: The new prototype doesn't think much of the company's CEO, Mark Zuckerberg, either.
